Message:
Cerberus was crying alone
inside the mountain shrine.

Lightning was violently striking
everything around her...

as if it were barricading
her heart.

Once a Witch of Qlipha
goes berserk, no one
can reach them.

But lucky for us,
Master’s staff can.

When I called out
to calm her down,

the lightning weakened,
and she looked at me in surprise.

Tears start to well up
in her eyes.

But as I stood there relieved,
her face started to twist
in anguish.

and the lightning
enveloped her once more...
